article.title: Four Firms Awarded Integrated Training Contract
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: Army Mission and Installation Contracting Command

article.text: URS Federal Support Services Incorporated, Germantown, Maryland; Calibre Systems Incorporated, Alexandria, Virginia; Booz Allen Hamilton, McLean, Virginia; and Parsons Infrastructure, Washington, D.C., were awarded a more than $24 million contract for the support services to develop, deliver and enable an operationally relevant and totally integrated live, virtual, constructive and gaming training environment.Â The U.S. Army Mission and Installation Contracting Command, Fort Eustis, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
